Package gr.fire.util

Interface Summary
Logger  
 

Class Summary
FireConnector FireConnector is a utility class containing a set of I/O supporting methods.
Lang The Lang class in an easy to use internationallization (i18n) implementation.
Log Utility class for easily logging on fire application.
Queue  
StringUtil StringUtil is a utility class that splits a string into lines, according to a specified width.
